org.forgerock.openig.heap
Interface Heaplet

All Superinterfaces:
Indexed<Class>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AssignmentFilter.Heaplet, CaptureFilter.Heaplet, Chain.Heaplet, ClientHandler.Heaplet, ConsoleLogSink.Heaplet, CookieFilter.Heaplet, CryptoHeaderFilter.Heaplet, DispatchHandler.Heaplet, DispatchServlet.Heaplet, EntityExtractFilter.Heaplet, ExceptionFilter.Heaplet, FederationServlet.Heaplet, FileAttributesFilter.Heaplet, FileLogSink.Heaplet, GenericFilterHeaplet, GenericHeaplet, GenericServletHeaplet, HandlerServlet.Heaplet, HeaderFilter.Heaplet, HttpBasicAuthFilter.Heaplet, HttpServletHeaplet, NestedHeaplet, PBWorksLoginHandler.Heaplet, SequenceHandler.Heaplet, ServletFilterHeaplet, SqlAttributesFilter.Heaplet, StaticRequestFilter.Heaplet, StaticResponseHandler.Heaplet, SwitchFilter.Heaplet, TemporaryStorage.Heaplet
public interface Heaplet
extends Indexed<Class>

Creates and initializes an object that is stored in a Heap. A heaplet can retrieve object(s) it depends on from the heap.

Method Summary
 Object create(String name, org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue config, Heap heap)
          Called to request the heaplet create an object.
 void destroy()
          Called to indicate that the object created by the heaplet is going to be dereferenced.
 Class<?> getKey()
          Returns the class of object that the heaplet will create.
 

Method Detail

getKey

Class<?> getKey()
Returns the class of object that the heaplet will create.

Specified by:
getKey in interface Indexed<Class>

create

Object create(String name,
              org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue config,
              Heap heap)
              throws HeapException,
                     org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValueException
Called to request the heaplet create an object.

Parameters:
name - the name of the object to be created.
config - the heaplet's configuration object.
heap - the heap where object dependencies can be retrieved.
Returns:
the object created by the heaplet.
Throws:
HeapException - if an exception occurred during creation of the object or any of its dependencies.
org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValueException - if the heaplet (or one of its dependencies) has a malformed configuration object.

destroy

void destroy()
Called to indicate that the object created by the heaplet is going to be dereferenced. This gives the heaplet an opportunity to free any resources that are being held prior to its dereference.
